item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-04-24
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Grabbing a drink and dinner with @ckirsten. Another week is over! (@ Washington Square Tavern) #
  • Jeff's Gimlet @ Washington Square Tavern #
  • After dinner coffee & baklava! (@ Athan's Bakery) #
  • I'm at Starbucks (Brookline/Chestnut Hill) (1154 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #
  • I'm at MBTA Chestnut Hill Station (Hammond Street and Middlesex Road, Chestnut Hill). #
  • I'm at NIKETOWN Boston (200 Newbury St, Boston). #
  • Looking for a book covering LINQ & sharded databases. So far no luck, although it looks like C# 4.0 might have answers. (@ Borders) #
  • Here because we pretend to be sporty. (@ Marathon Sports) #

Powered by Twitter Tools
